subject: Re: PRIME LOTTERY INTERNATIONAL
body:
Attention Lewis D.

This is to acknowledge the recipient of your email to this office regarding
your winning fund.

To claim your winning prize all you need to do is to reconfirm your full
delivery information and cell phone number and WhatsApp number if you have.

Furthermore, everything has been done and the delivery is ready but we are
yet to receive the necessary requirements in order to deliver your package
to you.

Noted, the delivery will take 24 hours to get to you once all the necessary
requirements is provided to this office.

Regards.

Samson lee.
Coordinator general.

subject: Re: PRIME LOTTERY INTERNATIONAL
body:
This is Samson Lee from lottery office, I want you to know that your fund
files is out for the processing of your fund delivery to you but no
response from you until now.

Does it mean that you have abandoned your fund? Are you too rich? Even if
you are too rich, don't you have poor family and friends to help with this
fund instead of allowing the government to confiscate your fund?

Why delaying this delivery.

Samson lee

subject: Re: PRIME LOTTERY INTERNATIONAL
body:
How are you today? Please I advised that
you should read this email very carefully and get back to me immediately to
avoid wrong delivery of your winning fund presently at our custody.

Based on the meeting held yesterday with the United Nations Officials,
USA Officials with Office of the
President of world bank regarding all overdue inheritance payment File of
which your name and email ID was listed among the unpaid beneficiary,
I am writing to inform you that your files appeared on our desk to pay
your fund to you.

But we are having misunderstanding because a lady by name Mrs. Monica
Cadle, from United States of America called our Office on Tuesday
stating that she is your new next of kin that you have given her the
power of attorney to claim your unpaid
Fund, she clearly informed our Office that you have instructed
her to receive the funds on your favor that you are greatly sick which
makes it impossible for you to answer all our calls and email to you
so far that you cannot work or answer any calls due to your presently
health condition.

Executive Board of Director Federal Ministry of Finance are currently so
confuse about her claim that is why the
authority instructed me to contact you for us to know if she is telling us
the truth.

If no response from you after 24 hours we will go ahead and deliver the
funds to her info, so sorry for your present condition.

On Thursday, February 8, 2024, Tiffany <vy66505@***.com> wrote:
>
>
>
> Dear Sir Samson Lee,
>
> I am thrilled to hear about my lottery win. I would like to proceed with
the claim process as soon as possible. Could you please provide me with
more details on how to do this?
>
> Looking forward to your prompt response.
>
> Best regards,
> Lewis D.
>
> Best wishes,
> Tiffany
>
>
>
>
>
